data.title: Grand Blanc Mi
data.text:
Council

MEET THE COUNCIL

The City Council consists of the Mayor and six Council Members. All must be US citizens who have reached the age of 18 and registered voters of the City of Grand Blanc. Members are elected at large by the citizens of the City in November of odd-numbered years to staggered 4-year terms. A proposal on the November 2006 City ballot was passed, changing the Mayor's term from 2 years to 4 years. This change took effect beginning with the mayoral election in November 2007.

City Council meetings are held on the 2nd and 4th Wednesdays of each month at 7 PM in the Council Room at City Hall. During the summer months of June, July and August, only the 2nd Wednesday Council meetings are held.

Everyone is welcome to attend.

2024 SCHEDULE
